title: I was banned for toxicity.... but I wasnt even toxic???
body:
here is the chat logs, not hidign anything


Game 1
xWeixin Vinleous: resolve ashe with tp BTW
xWeixin Vinleous: what rhymes with that? TriHard
xWeixin Vinleous: TriHard 7
xWeixin Vinleous: can i cleanse lulu polymorph btw?
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: take control of botside
xWeixin Vinleous: infernal is uip
xWeixin Vinleous: lissandra ignited me
xWeixin Vinleous: for some reason
xWeixin Vinleous: even though an auto attack would have done more than enough to kill me
xWeixin Vinleous: 0/3 yas needs a gank btw hahaa
xWeixin Vinleous: typical yas
xWeixin Vinleous: we lost infernal now
xWeixin Vinleous: 0/4? checkmark. lost lane? checkmark. wants a gank? checkmarl. typical yasuo player
xWeixin Vinleous: something called a cooldow2n
xWeixin Vinleous: cooldown*
xWeixin Vinleous: yea
xWeixin Vinleous: theres a pause before you can do it again
xWeixin Vinleous: im not even toxic LOL
xWeixin Vinleous: what did i say, then?
xWeixin Vinleous: you will lose report value
xWeixin Vinleous: i actually run cross country btw
xWeixin Vinleous: im not fat at all
xWeixin Vinleous: see this yasuo is the type of person to shitpost on reddit
xWeixin Vinleous: tells me im bullied at school at beat at home lul
xWeixin Vinleous: "report kog btw" 
xWeixin Vinleous: and talks like that
xWeixin Vinleous: y burn ult though
xWeixin Vinleous: this yasuo wants to surrender but says no because its me who is requesting it LOL
xWeixin Vinleous: now this yasuo is just lying
xWeixin Vinleous: all i did was ping their death timers
xWeixin Vinleous: not typing anything toxic
xWeixin Vinleous: enjoy your ban, yasuo
xWeixin Vinleous: toxic
xWeixin Vinleous: ? im not even inting lol
xWeixin Vinleous: im 0/4
xWeixin Vinleous: he's 2/7
xWeixin Vinleous: pls
xWeixin Vinleous: 2/8*
xWeixin Vinleous: umm not true but ok
xWeixin Vinleous: never said thats why we are losing
xWeixin Vinleous: i said thats proof im not inting
xWeixin Vinleous: 1 shroom did my whole healthbar lol
xWeixin Vinleous: what are you? gold 5? of shit its god
xWeixin Vinleous: OH SHIT
xWeixin Vinleous: HES SO GOOD
xWeixin Vinleous: GOLD 3 TALKING BAD ABOUT SILVER 2 LOL
xWeixin Vinleous: thats toxic, see?
xWeixin Vinleous: report yasuo called me xxl size and braindead
xWeixin Vinleous: riot can look at chat and see if im lying
xWeixin Vinleous: you will probably get punished for trying to cover up the lie
Game 2
xWeixin Vinleous: so many flashes
xWeixin Vinleous: \that was an easy kill
xWeixin Vinleous: why stop
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: well it took you 2 whiffed ults 
xWeixin Vinleous: who's the real ape
xWeixin Vinleous: against an illaoi
xWeixin Vinleous: you build merc
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: dude
xWeixin Vinleous: why did you leave aggro
xWeixin Vinleous: because its illaoi..........
xWeixin Vinleous: you really dont know this matchup, do you
xWeixin Vinleous: i dont outrange her.....
xWeixin Vinleous: she has q
xWeixin Vinleous: e
xWeixin Vinleous: i cant just spam barrels
xWeixin Vinleous: how so
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: double infernal
xWeixin Vinleous: gg
xWeixin Vinleous: how so
xWeixin Vinleous: so?
xWeixin Vinleous: you are 1/5
xWeixin Vinleous: dont question
xWeixin Vinleous: so?
xWeixin Vinleous: you have 83
xWeixin Vinleous: not much better
xWeixin Vinleous: not to the point where you can talk trash
xWeixin Vinleous: ww is supposed to power farm
xWeixin Vinleous: ???????????????????
xWeixin Vinleous: you dont know this game
xWeixin Vinleous: muted
xWeixin Vinleous: dont pull the silver card unless you are at least masters- challenger lmao
xWeixin Vinleous: Ape
xWeixin Vinleous: Ape
xWeixin Vinleous: >?
xWeixin Vinleous: Ape
xWeixin Vinleous: lol
xWeixin Vinleous: Apes
xWeixin Vinleous: ??????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
xWeixin Vinleous: cause there was vision
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: thanks for the scuttle LOL
xWeixin Vinleous: worth
xWeixin Vinleous: worth for inhib
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: burned ww ult on a gp
xWeixin Vinleous: ape
xWeixin Vinleous: so
xWeixin Vinleous: now you dont have it for the next fight
xWeixin Vinleous: how so
xWeixin Vinleous: so can you let me farm
xWeixin Vinleous: pls
xWeixin Vinleous: TWITCH STOP FARMING PLEASE
xWeixin Vinleous: you are full build
xWeixin Vinleous: ............
xWeixin Vinleous: the thing is
xWeixin Vinleous: how so
xWeixin Vinleous: rammus was afk for a long time
xWeixin Vinleous: you shouldve won a while ago
xWeixin Vinleous: apes
xWeixin Vinleous: you are 4/8, not much better
Game 3
xWeixin Vinleous: no
xWeixin Vinleous: im building tank
xWeixin Vinleous: im retarded
xWeixin Vinleous: sorry
xWeixin Vinleous: lol
xWeixin Vinleous: last game i played
xWeixin Vinleous: i counterjungled a kayn
xWeixin Vinleous: as ammumu
xWeixin Vinleous: lol
xWeixin Vinleous: push
xWeixin Vinleous: ........
xWeixin Vinleous: so greedy
xWeixin Vinleous: i saw that
xWeixin Vinleous: low iq?
xWeixin Vinleous: oh, so its all my fault
xWeixin Vinleous: thats not what you said
xWeixin Vinleous: stop feeding
xWeixin Vinleous: how about that
xWeixin Vinleous: next time you die
xWeixin Vinleous: im staying in base for 10,00 gold
xWeixin Vinleous: 10,000*
xWeixin Vinleous: recall........
xWeixin Vinleous: and it doesnt explain why YOU are 0/2
xWeixin Vinleous: and not NAUT
xWeixin Vinleous: ?
xWeixin Vinleous: ?
xWeixin Vinleous: yea
xWeixin Vinleous: vayne needs farm
xWeixin Vinleous: not exactly
xWeixin Vinleous: they have a twitch
xWeixin Vinleous: ward rift
xWeixin Vinleous: firopa
xWeixin Vinleous: warned you guys
xWeixin Vinleous: *makes monkey noises*
xWeixin Vinleous: talon stop dying
xWeixin Vinleous: please
xWeixin Vinleous: vayne too
xWeixin Vinleous: please do so
xWeixin Vinleous: thats what we need
xWeixin Vinleous: and for you guys to stop dying
xWeixin Vinleous: now
xWeixin Vinleous: group
xWeixin Vinleous: wait for it
xWeixin Vinleous: ...........
xWeixin Vinleous: draagon for 3
xWeixin Vinleous: not worth
xWeixin Vinleous: ok boys
xWeixin Vinleous: nice
xWeixin Vinleous: boosed ap
xWeixin Vinleous: ape*
xWeixin Vinleous: vayne's
xWeixin Vinleous: not me, wasnt my error
xWeixin Vinleous: she burned flash for not reason
xWeixin Vinleous: dont talk if it wasnt towards you
xWeixin Vinleous: so have you
xWeixin Vinleous: nice
xWeixin Vinleous: vayne just neeeds to farm
xWeixin Vinleous: fiora honored
xWeixin Vinleous: wait
xWeixin Vinleous: wait
xWeixin Vinleous: ok then
xWeixin Vinleous: risky but ill take it
xWeixin Vinleous: coming
xWeixin Vinleous: they are ending right here
xWeixin Vinleous: why say no


i will also like to say that the yasuo and thresh that lied about calling me xxl and braindead arent banned..... they said it in all chat that i was lying....


also me and my friends all call each other "apes" and its a joke in general so i doubt thats the reason why i was banned.

The results are in...

You were actually pretty damn negative and toxic.

Just random snippets.
i already told you about those, you didnt read my full post.

I did, but it is irrelevant. The Thresh and Yas might get a chat restriction unless they used hate speech. Unless you are playing with a full team, the other players may not know that you and your friends call each other apes. As far as their concerned you are being rude to them.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:27:29.793+0000)
>
> how so?

even the "10,000" in base thing i doubt was the reason i was banned, i say it alot but i dont afk at all and its just a funny thing to say imho.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:29:17.709+0000)
>
> even the "10,000" in base thing i doubt was the reason i was banned, i say it alot but i dont afk at all and its just a funny thing to say imho.

You're right, it's not. It's everything the panda is telling you, unfortunately.

You're actually pretty damn negative and toxic. Punishment justified.

You argue with your teammates, harass them, pick on them, you're actually not very pleasant to play with by the looks of it, and you have everything to say about the tiniest of things. In addition, calling your teammates apes isn't helping your situation at all.

You should probably lay off that ENTER button and start reforming.

i call my people apes alot, its not taken seriously because its a joke that everyone knows. Imaqtpie says it alot, roit doesnt ban him, so its not toxic. its a known joke that alot of people use, i doubt thats the reason i was banned.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:43:33.655+0000)
>
> i call my people apes alot, its not taken seriously because its a joke that everyone knows. Imaqtpie says it alot, roit doesnt ban him, so its not toxic. its a known joke that alot of people use, i doubt thats the reason i was banned.

There's a difference between just keeping it to yourself vocally on stream vs typing it in-game. Adding to that, qtpie isn't known for being toxic, probably trolly but not a total asshole. Barring that, it still doesn't excuse your other negative behavior and just generally harassing your teammates.
so what was harassing my teammates?

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:49:57.670+0000)
>
> so what was harassing my teammates?

I give up. Clearly you're clueless and refuse to learn from your mistakes or even consider re-reading your own chat log to find out what you did wrong. Good luck on reforming.
because i explained most of my chats in my post. whats clear is that you didnt read my post, and therefore you make false assumptions about me.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:52:16.377+0000)
>
> because i explained most of my chats in my post. whats clear is that you didnt read my post, and therefore you make false assumptions about me.

You're unpleasant to play with and you deserved the ban, if you're still confused you can try getting a hint from what everyone else tried to tell you.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:52:16.377+0000)
>
> because i explained most of my chats in my post. whats clear is that you didnt read my post, and therefore you make false assumptions about me.

Its actually very clear that he read your posts and he even answered why your reasons don't really matter. (Like when you claimed he didn't read that you say that to your frienfs, and then he explained how that doesn't matter.) For real man, these people are telling you the truth. I don't know why you're denying it. We've been watching the boards for a while and have a pretty good idea of what Riot bans for.

 Take it as a learning experience, not us showing you what's up. We are here to educate and that's what we are trying to do but you're refusing it lol. This isn't us trying to win an argument (maybe to some it is) and rub it in your face. You asked a question, and we are giving you the honest answer. Yet you're sitting here telling us we are wrong? Then why are you punished??? 

Just because you don't agree with it, doesn't mean you have to refuse accepting it. You can carry on with a new account, knowing what will get you punished, and avoid it. It doesn't mean you agree with it and Riot won and now you're a little bitch lol. 

No, it just means you're no longer ignorant of the rules and your account will always be safe because you aren't ignorant and you can prevent yourself from crossing that line again, even though you don't think that line should be there. It's what I do. I don't agree with permabanning people because you offended someone. But I'm not gonna get my account banned out of a stubborness.

>because i explained most of my chats in my post.

Your post isn't visible to the people in the game that reported you.
Pretty sure he's doing it on purpose, as if every little bit of "_innocence_" can save his account.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:49:57.670+0000)
>
> so what was harassing my teammates?

sO whAt WaS har- well shit lets look at just game one!

> xWeixin Vinleous: 0/3 yas needs a gank btw hahaa
xWeixin Vinleous: typical yas
xWeixin Vinleous: we lost infernal now
xWeixin Vinleous: 0/4? checkmark. lost lane? checkmark. wants a gank? checkmarl. typical yasuo player
xWeixin Vinleous: see this yasuo is the type of person to shitpost on reddit
xWeixin Vinleous: not typing anything toxic (haha thats a good one)
xWeixin Vinleous: enjoy your ban, yasuo
xWeixin Vinleous: toxic
xWeixin Vinleous: ? im not even inting lol
xWeixin Vinleous: im 0/4
xWeixin Vinleous: he's 2/7
xWeixin Vinleous: pls
 xWeixin Vinleous: 2/8



and the obv asking for reports. Game 2 oh lets see start shit by bringing up stuff about ww missing his ult and then constantly argue, more k/d harrasement and wait why is a solo laner trying to use farm argument? lol. Literally dont have to continue any further. You've also been chat restricted multiple times before which also is a cause of this. The yas and thresh probably havent been punished as many times as you and couldve only gotten a chat restrict, yas also hasnt done any games after the one you got banned on. The whole "i didnt get a notification" thing doesnt work unless you literally waited half an hour for everyone to leave and then report lol.

You can get reported just for using the word "report" happened to me and Riot said it was my fault. Good ol Riot thinking of anyway to ban non toxic players and let the real toxic players keep doing what they do best.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahktos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:23:57.276+0000)
>
> You can get reported just for using the word "report" happened to me and Riot said it was my fault. Good ol Riot thinking of anyway to ban non toxic players and let the real toxic players keep doing what they do best.

but i said to report yasuo and thresh AFTER they tried to get the team to report me for toxicity when i wasnt even arguing with them yet. i was pinging the yasuo's death timer.

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:30:37.840+0000)
>
> but i said to report yasuo and thresh AFTER they tried to get the team to report me for toxicity when i wasnt even arguing with them yet. i was pinging the yasuo's death timer.

Don't listen to him.  He's losing it because he got chat restricted for harassing teammates.  Since he couldn't even get one line before trying to start ^$#& with teammates, it's not really surprising that all he got out of it was "you get banned for saying report".

> [{quoted}](name=xWeixin Vinleous,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:30:37.840+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rNxg4AKs,comment-id=0000000000020000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T04:46:53.267+0000)
>
> Profanity isn't the only way to flame. Constantly telling someone you're going to report them, trying to get others to report them, and constantly talking about someone's behavior are all flaming.
so that's permanent ban worthy?
If you have recieved a 10 and 25 chat restriction, and a 14 day ban? Yes. You clearly aren't learning what's acceptable and not, Riot is telling you to go away.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahktos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:34:00.942+0000)

> 

So in other words pretty much everything is Flaming.{{summoner:14}}  This was from the GrandLord Advisors of League Of Legends. May they guide us to non toxicity. My best advice is dont spend any money on this game because you never know when that permaban is coming. Riots Ban Happy at the moment.
Yeah... No... That isn't what happened in your post about a chat restriction.

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:27:31.959+0000)
>

Lol tell me what i said that was offensive?

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:38:47.102+0000)
>

I am talking about his topic. Im telling him he got banned for using the word report.

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:27:31.959+0000)
>
> Yeah... No... That isn't what happened in your post about a chat restriction.

please stick to my topic right now.... if anything i would really enjoy it if a rioter actually came onto this board and looked at my chatlogs..... ive said all this before and people say it back and its all fun and games..... i dont get why after the game where people start calling me names and making false accusationas about my life and report me would actually get me banned.....
Any Rioter that shows up is gonna tell you the exact same thing - your chat is not okay, your ban will not be reversed, check yourself.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahktos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:23:57.276+0000)
>
> You can get reported just for using the word "report" happened to me and Riot said it was my fault. Good ol Riot thinking of anyway to ban non toxic players and let the real toxic players keep doing what they do best.

other than the fact you were also constatly harassing xd. keep whining in comments.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahktos,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:23:57.276+0000)
>
> You can get reported just for using the word "report" happened to me and Riot said it was my fault. Good ol Riot thinking of anyway to ban non toxic players and let the real toxic players keep doing what they do best.

riot is a shit company there want's their game to be a competetive game. But how in the fuck do you wan't people not to say "stop feed" Toxic?: Yes. "Noob" Tocxic?: Yes Th word litterly anything toxic?: Yes
Yet riot still can't ban my 0/1000000 bot lane stupid banning system

I took a look at these logs, as well as your prior 2-week from 2 months ago (per your boards posts). It looks like this ban was appropriate. In both these logs and the 2-week logs, you single out players, insulting them, arguing with them, or harassing them. You also called for reports, which also factors into your punishment. You were told in your previous punishment that the permanent ban was the next step if you did not reform. I would say if you make another account, that you not harp on players' bad plays, or their poor kda. It doesn't help the team achieve goals, and insulting them isn't a proven way of getting better results from your teammates.
Is losing report value a thing? Is that why none of my reports work?

No, report value is *not* a thing. You can report as often or as little as you like for whatever the hell reason you want. Your report is still going to do the same thing--trigger a review of their chat.
Thank you.

Awww it was all looking so nice n civil until you started picking on the "typical yasuo" (stereotype and generalize people much?). I think that's where you were toxic, but I'm just a guy. Riot makes the decisions, they deemed you punishment worthy, they gave you punishment. I don't know where the confusion is? I mean, it's fine if you didn't know that's toxic, but now you do right? Riot considers that toxic. You learned something xD good luck after your punishment.

>also me and my friends all call each other "apes" and its a joke in general so i doubt thats the reason why i was banned.

i wish people like you would stop monkeying around in chat and just play the damn game...

also that was the reason

next time keep your in-jokes to yourselves!

> also me and my friends all call each other "apes" and its a joke in general so i doubt thats the reason why i was banned.

Were you in a five-man premade with your friends in those matches? And did you keep it exclusively in team chat?

If not, then it adds to the reason why you were banned. Just because your friends are cool with it doesn't mean everybody else'll be cool with it. If you have potentially offensive humor that you use between your friends, or potentially offensive inside jokes, _keep them among your friends. **Don't use them amongst random players.**_

"Toxic" isn't a particularly useful term for discussion.  So let's look at what happened in those games.

Those games do not have you using the chat feature appropriately.  The chat logs are instead filled with you arguing with people instead of playing the game when you have been warned multiple times to cease in this behaviour.  You continued to violate your agreement in spite of this, that is why you are banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Sona Ping,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ATjI6kky,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-08T05:36:02.505+0000)
>
> "Toxic" isn't a particularly useful term for discussion.  So let's look at what happened in those games.
> 
> Those games do not have you using the chat feature appropriately.  The chat logs are instead filled with you arguing with people instead of playing the game when you have been warned multiple times to cease in this behaviour.  You continued to violate your agreement in spite of this, that is why you are banned.

but then why arent the players who were actually being toxic banned? i was told that i was beat at home and bullied at school. I was told that i wear size XXL. THey lied in all chat and therefore didnt get reported. THose people werent banned. I was. And the fact that I argued with people instead of playing the game doesnt make sense. I wasnt toxic, period. I should not get banned when i am not the one ruin other people's games and hurting other people's feelings. Its not fair that people get to say things like that to me and get away with it.

_"But qtpie says apes"_
Does he type it in chat to flame his teammates?  Or does he say it to his stream viewers as an entertainer?

_"Why aren't the other people banned"_
There is an amount of leniency built into the system because, you know, it's a competitive game, people get heated and all that.
It does not matter than one person used up their leniency, their chances, however you would like to think of it, before another person.  It doesn't matter that other person happened to be in the same game as someone who did.

Say there's a game and it uses a point system.  You get 4 points every time you violate the rules by fighting and you get banned at 100.  One person in a game has 76 points on their account another person has 96.  They fight with each other, they both are guilty of it, they both receive 4 points.   They are both being treated equally and fairly by the same rules.  It doesn't matter that the first guy fights less frequently so he has not gotten banned yet.

_"I wasnt toxic, period."_
If you are at a casino gaming table, your neighborhood card and board game shop, or the local Denny's or anywhere else and you argue with other customers, you will be asked to leave.  If it happens multiple times, you may be banned from the establishment

You have been violating the written agreement that you have made by abusing the chat functionality to argue with other players.  This is a violation of your legal contract.  You may call it "toxic" if you wish, but you have committed a violation of your contract, and as such you have terminated it.
